languages.text: Зловещего вида устройство, в котором имперские технологии сплавлены с нечестивыми знаниями ксеносов. Саргона использовал его, чтобы достичь предела своих псайкерских способностей, но, как известно, у всего есть цена.

A sinister-looking device that blends Imperium technology with the unholy knowledge of the xenos. Sargona used it to take his psyker abilities to their absolute limits. However, it is common knowledge that everything comes at a price.
languages.original_text: Зловещего вида устройство, в котором имперские технологии сплавлены с нечестивыми знаниями ксеносов. Саргона использовал его, чтобы достичь предела своих псайкерских способностей, но, как известно, у всего есть цена.

traits.locale_text: A sinister-looking device that blends Imperium technology with the unholy knowledge of the xenos. Sargona used it to take his psyker abilities to their limits. But it's common knowledge that everything comes at a price.

A sinister-looking device that blends Imperium technology with the unholy knowledge of the xenos. Sargona used it to take his psyker abilities to their absolute limits. However, it is common knowledge that everything comes at a price.

A sinister-looking device that blends Imperium technology with the unholy knowledge of the xenos. Sargona used it to take his psyker abilities to their absolute limits. However, it is common knowledge that everything comes at a price.

languages.text: Ein unheilvolles Gerät, das imperiale Technologien mit dem unheimlichen Wissen der Xenos kombiniert. Sargona hat seine Fähigkeiten als Psioniker auf die Spitze getrieben. Allerdings ist allgemein bekannt, dass alles einen Preis hat.
languages.original_text: A sinister-looking device that blends Imperium technology with the unholy knowledge of the xenos. Sargona used it to take his psyker abilities to their absolute limits. However, it is common knowledge that everything comes at a price.

traits.locale_text: Ein unheilvolles Gerät, das imperiale Technologien mit dem unheimlichen Wissen der Xenos kombiniert. Sargona hat seine Fähigkeiten als Psioniker auf die Spitze getrieben. Allerdings ist allgemein bekannt, dass alles einen Preis hat.

languages.text: Un appareil d'apparence sinistre associant la technologie de l'Imperium au savoir impie des xénos et utilisé par Sargona pour pousser ses aptitudes de psyker jusqu'à leurs plus extrêmes limites. Cependant, comme chacun le sait, toute chose a un prix.
languages.original_text: A sinister-looking device that blends Imperium technology with the unholy knowledge of the xenos. Sargona used it to take his psyker abilities to their absolute limits. However, it is common knowledge that everything comes at a price.

traits.locale_text: Un appareil d'apparence sinistre associant la technologie de l'Imperium au savoir impie des xénos et utilisé par Sargona pour pousser ses aptitudes de psyker jusqu'à leurs plus extrêmes limites. Cependant, comme chacun le sait, toute chose a un prix.

languages.text: Un dispositivo de aspecto siniestro que combina tecnología del Imperium con los impíos conocimientos de los xenos. Sargona lo utilizaba para forzar sus aptitudes psíquicas hasta sus límites más absolutos. Pero como se suele decir, todo conlleva un precio.
languages.original_text: A sinister-looking device that blends Imperium technology with the unholy knowledge of the xenos. Sargona used it to take his psyker abilities to their absolute limits. However, it is common knowledge that everything comes at a price.

traits.locale_text: Un dispositivo de aspecto siniestro que combina tecnología del Imperium con los impíos conocimientos de los xenos. Sargona lo utilizaba para forzar sus aptitudes psíquicas hasta sus límites más absolutos. Pero como se suele decir, todo conlleva un precio.

languages.text: 这台装置散发着不祥的气息，融合了帝国科技与异形的邪恶知识。在这台增强器的辅助下，萨戈纳将他的灵能能力发挥到了极致。然而，众所周知，世上没有免费的午餐。
languages.original_text: A sinister-looking device that blends Imperium technology with the unholy knowledge of the xenos. Sargona used it to take his psyker abilities to their absolute limits. However, it is common knowledge that everything comes at a price.

traits.locale_text: 这台装置散发着不祥的气息，融合了帝国科技与异形的邪恶知识。在这台增强器的辅助下，萨戈纳将他的灵能能力发挥到了极致。然而，众所周知，世上没有免费的午餐。

languages.text: 帝国の技術と異種族の知識が融合した、不気味な外見の装置。サルゴナはそれを使い、自らの異能者の能力を極限まで引き出した。しかし、何事にも代償があるということは、誰もが知っている。
languages.original_text: A sinister-looking device that blends Imperium technology with the unholy knowledge of the xenos. Sargona used it to take his psyker abilities to their absolute limits. However, it is common knowledge that everything comes at a price.

traits.locale_text: 帝国の技術と異種族の知識が融合した、不気味な外見の装置。サルゴナはそれを使い、自らの異能者の能力を極限まで引き出した。しかし、何事にも代償があるということは、誰もが知っている。

languages.text: İmparatorluk teknolojisini zenoların uğursuz bilgileriyle harmanlayan, tüyler ürperten bir cihaz. Sargona, bu cihazla ruhsezer yeteneklerini mutlak sınırlarına ulaştırmaya çalıştı. Ancak bilinir ki her şeyin bir bedeli vardır.
languages.original_text: A sinister-looking device that blends Imperium technology with the unholy knowledge of the xenos. Sargona used it to take his psyker abilities to their absolute limits. However, it is common knowledge that everything comes at a price.

traits.locale_text: İmparatorluk teknolojisini zenoların uğursuz bilgileriyle harmanlayan, tüyler ürperten bir cihaz. Sargona, bu cihazla ruhsezer yeteneklerini mutlak sınırlarına ulaştırmaya çalıştı. Ancak bilinir ki her şeyin bir bedeli vardır.
